result.title: Presidency Conference
result.description: Setup the event concept and run the Conference. This task will build on a set of information generated by FCT and the Advisory Panel within WP2. This includes the conceptual idea of the panels, their architecture and recommended speakers. Based on this, a side exhibition in the vicinity of the event venue will be though and selected testimonials or distinguished innovative business ideas to be shown. In case of a virtual conference, an adapted format will be considered with including recorded success cases connected to research funded at EU or national levels.
